Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Humanoid
        • Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HumanoidObject, Object2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineWalkZombie, MasterZombie, RandomWalkZombie

    public class Zombie
extends Humanoid
implements HumanoidObject
    Sets up everything that a zombie has, such as smell, speed, decision rate and how the sprite will move. Each zombie is an object so it extends GameObject which implements Object2D. Each zombie also needs to track the human, so it implements HumanoidObject which lets it get the human's current location.
